properties.displayName: Windows – Brute-force for failed logon attempts
properties.description: High-rate 4625 failures from same Computer/Account/IpAddress within 15 minutes.
properties.query:
// Brute-force for failed logon attempts (your Analytics rule query)
let window = 24h;
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(window)
| where EventID == 4625
| summarize Fails = count(), Start = min(TimeGenerated), End = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer, Account, IpAddress
| where Fails >= 5 and End - Start < 15m
| order by Fails desc
